mapper.sql: name, daolianshu, sum_hours, pacemaker_parameter, offset, record_minutes, record_mounth, record_day, record_year, hospital_number, serial_number, sex, operation_doctor, diagnostic_doctor, age, clinic_number, bed_number, department, yongyaoshuoming, conclusion, hospital_name, default_hospital_name, hospital_address, hospital_phonenum, hospital_fax, patient_year, patient_month, patient_day, suggest, note, case_tag, holter_load_date, handwritten_conclusion
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from caseinfo
order by ${orderByClause}
